actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A concurrent resolution to reiterate that the Congress has not delegated to the Federal Trade Commission any authority to preempt the laws of the States and their political subdivisions.

summary.text: Declares that Congress has not delegated to the Federal Trade Commission any authority to preempt State or local law.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to reiterate that the Congress has not delegated to the Federal Trade Commission any authority to preempt the laws of the States and their political subdivisions.
